title: Question regarding username
body:
can riot fix how a name is capitalized ? and with no charge?

an example would be like 

MeTeOrA , MeTeorA, meteora ...etc.

replies.body: We might be able to work something out!  When you know how you want it to be exactly, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We may be able to do a one off without costing anything since it's only capitalization.  :D
awesome thank you for letting me know!
